sentences.en: He must have been aware that my parents' marriage was breaking up.
sentences.cn: 他一定已经知道我父母的婚姻即将破裂。

sentences.en: He was just as feared and reviled as his tyrannical parents.
sentences.cn: 他和他专横残暴的父母一样为人惧怕和憎恨。

sentences.en: His parents tried to discourage his interest in music, but he persisted.
sentences.cn: 他的父母设法打消他对音乐的兴趣，但他始终坚持。

sentences.en: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
sentences.cn: 父母过于爱面子的做法在他儿时一直困扰着他。

sentences.en: His sisters are grown up and his parents are middle-aged.
sentences.cn: 他的姐妹们都已成人，而他的父母亲也人到中年。

sentences.en: I managed to keep my parents in the dark about this.
sentences.cn: 我设法对父母瞒下了此事。

sentences.en: Like their children, parents are often defensive about their private lives.
sentences.cn: 就像子女一样，父母也常常很注重保护他们的私生活。

sentences.en: Many parents find it hard to discourage bad behaviour.
sentences.cn: 很多父母觉得要孩子循规蹈矩是件很难的事情。

sentences.en: One of his main themes is the dissimilarity between parents and children.
sentences.cn: 他的主题之一就是父母和孩子的不同之处。

sentences.en: One of the parents was a most obnoxious character. No-one liked him.
sentences.cn: 其中一位家长极为惹人厌，没人喜欢他。

sentences.en: She confessed to her parents her desire to act.
sentences.cn: 她向父母坦言了自己想演戏的愿望。

sentences.en: Single parents cope heroically in doing the job of two people.
sentences.cn: 单身父母扮演双亲的角色非常辛苦。

sentences.en: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.
sentences.cn: 那对父母的表现也显得有些爱出风头。

sentences.en: This is where a lot of parents go wrong.
sentences.cn: 这正是很多父母犯错的地方。

sentences.en: When his master's off traveling, Caleb stays with Pierre's parents.
sentences.cn: 凯莱布在主人外出旅行时与皮埃尔的父母住在一起。

trans.tran_cn: 双亲，父母（ parent的名词复数 ）

trans.tran_en: Your parents are your mother and father
